articles.title: The smallest moon ever detected around Uranus and two around Neptune - HT Tech
articles.description: Astronomers have made a groundbreaking discovery, finding two tiny moons orbiting Neptune and one around Uranus. The Uranian moon, possibly the smallest ever detected, is just 5 miles wide.
articles.content: Astronomers have recently made an intriguing discovery in our solar system, uncovering two tiny moons circling Neptune and one orbiting Uranus. These newfound celestial companions bring the total cou… [+3211 chars]

articles.title: Michael Vaughan fumes at Joe Root DRS 'shocker'; deletes post later - The Times of India
articles.description: Cricket News: Former England skipper Michael Vaughan criticizes the Hawkeye technology for Joe Root's LBW dismissal in the ongoing Ranchi Test. Vaughan questions the accuracy of the decision and highlights that half the ball pitched outside the leg stump. Rea…

articles.title: MWC 2024: Event to spotlight AI's pivotal role in driving smartphone innovation - HT Tech
articles.description: MWC 2024: The attendees at the Mobile World Congress, Barcelona will focus a lot on artificial intelligence (AI) to revitalize the smartphone industry amidst declining sales.
